    Employee Utilities
    Author:
    nirbhaykekre

      EmployeeUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean assignManager(EmployeeRepository employeeRepository, java.lang.Long managerId, Employee employee)
      Assigns Manager with managerId to an employee.

      If managerId is null, method returns true.
      If Manager with managerId doesn't exist, method returns false indicating failure
      If Manager's employer is not same as employee, method returns false indicating failure
      otherwise, assigns the manager and returns true.

      Note: this utility won't save employee into database, all changes are in-memory
      static void fetchLazyAttributeFromEmployee(Employee employee)
      Fetches all the lazy attributes of current employee

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • EmployeeUtils

        public EmployeeUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • assignManager

        public static boolean assignManager(EmployeeRepository employeeRepository,
                                    java.lang.Long managerId,
                                    Employee employee)
        Assigns Manager with managerId to an employee.

        If managerId is null, method returns true.
        If Manager with managerId doesn't exist, method returns false indicating failure
        If Manager's employer is not same as employee, method returns false indicating failure
        otherwise, assigns the manager and returns true.

        Note: this utility won't save employee into database, all changes are in-memory
        Parameters:
        employeeRepository - CRUD repository for employee
        managerId - Manager id to be assigned to employee
        employee - Target employee
        Returns:
        boolean, true if manager is assigned successfully.

      • fetchLazyAttributeFromEmployee

        public static void fetchLazyAttributeFromEmployee(Employee employee)
        Fetches all the lazy attributes of current employee
        Parameters:
        employee - target employee
